org.trebor.swarmcon
Class MotionModel

java.lang.Object
  org.trebor.swarmcon.MotionModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
LiveModel, SimModel, SimpleSimModel
public abstract class MotionModel
extends java.lang.Object

This class models the motion of an orb. It may be a simulated motion model or a linkage to a live orb
